name: Trapped (itch) (2CAN0)
description:
Try to escape the maze within the time limit. But watch out. The further you come even crazier things will happen. E.g., animals will spawn and if they see you, they will attack.

Controls:

  • You can move the player using AWSD
  • Move your mouse to rotate the player
  • In the main menu you have to press enter to play

PowerUp:

  • Drone: The drone will show a minimap. The more you upgrade the drone, the more you will see.
  • Fan: The fan will make the fog less dense so you can see farther.
